name: W.E.C.R.Y
description:
A game made for Global Game Jam 2015, with the theme,

"What do we do now?".

============================

Controls :

Requires two players to be completed and at least one joystick.

Keyboard:

Movement: WASD

Shot bullets: Arrow keys

Shot bomb: Space

Joystick:

Movement: Left Analog Stick

Shot bullets: Right Analog Stick

Shot bomb: RB (R1)

===========================

Team:

Andrei Fernandes Costa

Flávio Caldieraro

Lucas Martins Alves

Rafael Swiatovy

Rodrigo Spilimbergo
